name: LCD output project
description: Create a mikroSDK 2.0 2x16 LCD-ready application in C language.
files_included:
**CMakeLists.txt:** Build configuration for mikroSDK LCD project.
**main.c:** A main file with ready-to-use LCD initialization logic.
outputs:
**.hex:** Hexadecimal binary for MCU flashing.
**.bin:** Raw binary for various deployment options.
requirements:
mikroSDK 2.0
LCD 2x16 connected to your board
